name: PositionStore
documentation:
Interface for storing and retrieving {@link Position} objects representing the last processed message indexes per segment for a given consumer.

A {@link Position} tracks consumption progress on a per-segment basis. This enables distributed, parallel consumption and accurate replay/resume behavior in Fluxzero.

methods.name: close
methods.documentation: Closes any underlying resources held by the store.

methods.name: position
resetPosition
storePosition
